Project

Class SceneMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mediator.Mediator
      • Project.SceneMediator

  • public class SceneMediator
extends Mediator
    Concrete implementation of a Mediator that handle and redirect requests from a set of objects that should exchange information among each other This is done in order to reduce the number of connections required in the application. The colleagues for this mediator are supposed to be views for enable the application to switch among views

      (package private) void activate(java.lang.String name)
      Given the name of a colleague, this mediator change the current view to that precise colleague (it has to be a name associated to a FXML view)
